name: Gravitron (armandorusso)
description:
You were left behind in space by your fellow feline crew, as you were a burden to them.

Stranded in space, collect fuel debree canisters that float around to refill your ship and survive as long as possible!

But, be careful for the asteroids, as some have a strong gravitational force and will pull your ship in!

Controls:

W (Left Stick Forward on Gamepad) - Thrust

A or D (Left Stick Left or Right on Gamepad) - Rotate Ship

F (Button West on Gamepad) - Deploy Fuel Hose

Made by:

Armando - Programmer & Artist

George - Programmer & VFX
